title: Michael Strahan | Ep 149 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Michael Strahan | Ep 149 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
One week from today, the NFL is BACK. In that spirit, the boys are joined on ALL THE SMOKE by some of the biggest names in football the next 2 weekends, starting with Hall of Fame defensive end and media personality Michael Strahan. The former Giant opens up about his legendary career, including winning the 2007 Super Bowl in New York. Plus, he talks the upcoming football season, Deion Sanders impact, some hoops and more. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
